name: Judas Dispatching a Letter from the Jews of Jerusalem to the Jews in Egypt
description: Judas Dispatching a Letter from the Jews of Jerusalem to the Jews in Egypt; Master of Jean de Mandeville (French, active 1350 - 1370); Paris, France; about 1360 - 1370; Tempera on parchment; Leaf: 34.9 x 26 cm (13 3/4 x 10 1/4 in.); Ms. 1, v2, fol. 153v; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Judas Dispatching a Letter from the Jews of Jerusalem to the Jews in Egypt
